farmcity.dao

Class InventoryDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • farmcity.dao.InventoryDAO

  • public class InventoryDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods to retrieve and modify data from the Inventory database

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void destroyInstance()
      This method set the current Player Data Access Object to null
      static InventoryDAO getInstance()
      This method initializes the Inventory Data Access Object
      java.util.ArrayList<InventoryCrop> getPlayerInventoryCrops(java.lang.String username)
      This method return an ArrayList of InventoryCrop of the Player who has the specified username
      void load()
      This method loads all the player's inventory data into a HashMap
      void save()
      This method allows player to save his/ her Players' current inventory progress to the database file.
      boolean updateInventory(java.lang.String username, InventoryCrop addCrop)
      This method adds new inventoryCrop to the ArrayList of inventoryCrop of the current Player and save player's current progress

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load()
          throws CityException
        This method loads all the player's inventory data into a HashMap
        Throws:
        CityException - if the file(s) cannot be found at the specified directory

      • getInstance

        public static InventoryDAO getInstance()
                                throws CityException
        This method initializes the Inventory Data Access Object
        Returns:
        Data Access Object for Inventory
        Throws:
        CityException - If the file(s) cannot be found at the specified directory, throws FileNotFoundException

      • destroyInstance

        public static void destroyInstance()
        This method set the current Player Data Access Object to null

      • getPlayerInventoryCrops

        public java.util.ArrayList<InventoryCrop> getPlayerInventoryCrops(java.lang.String username)
        This method return an ArrayList of InventoryCrop of the Player who has the specified username
        Parameters:
        username - username of the player whose inventory is to be returned
        Returns:
        ArrayList of InventoryCrop of the current player

      • updateInventory

        public boolean updateInventory(java.lang.String username,
                               InventoryCrop addCrop)
        This method adds new inventoryCrop to the ArrayList of inventoryCrop of the current Player and save player's current progress
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the current player
        addCrop - Name of the inventoryCrop to be added to the player's inventory
        Returns:
        true if the process of adding crop is successful, false if it's not successful

      • save

        public void save()
          throws CityException
        This method allows player to save his/ her Players' current inventory progress to the database file.
        Throws:
        CityException - if there is something wrong with writing to the file
